actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To redesignate the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund as the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Accounting Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Accounting Fund, respectively.
short_title: Straighter Talk on Social Security Act of 2001
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Straighter Talk on Social Security Act of 2001 - Redesignates the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund as the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Accounting Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Accounting Fund, respectively.

titles.title: Straighter Talk on Social Security Act of 2001

To redesignate the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Trust Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Trust Fund as the Federal Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Accounting Fund and the Federal Disability Insurance Accounting Fund, respectively.
